Trigger.Name: T3 Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w]{8}:[\w-' ]+ gains the effect of (?<dot>Thunder ?(I+V?)?) \w+ (?<player>[\w-' ]+) for (?<duration>\d+)\.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: DIA Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.+gains the effect of (?<dot>Aero|Aero II|Dia) from (?<player>[A-Za-z'\-]+ [A-Za-z'\-]+) for (?<duration>\d+.\d+?) Seconds

Trigger.Name: CT Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w-' ]{8}:(?<target>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Chaos Thrust from (?<player>[\w-' ]+) for (?<time>[\d+.]+) Seconds

Trigger.Name: SF Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.+gains the effect of Shadow Fang from (?<player>[A-Za-z'\-]+ [A-Za-z'\-]+)

Trigger.Name: DEM Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:(?<id>[A-Z0-9]{8}):[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31} gains the effect of Demolish from (?<player>[\w-' ]+) for (?<time>[\d+.]+) Seconds

Trigger.Name: CB Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.+ gains the effect of (?<name>Caustic Bite|Venomous Bite) from (?<player>[\w' ]{0,30}) for (?<duration>\d+).\d+ Seconds.

Trigger.Name: SB Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.+ gains the effect of (?<name>Stormbite|Windbite) from (?<player>[\w' ]{0,30}) for (?<duration>\d+).\d+ Seconds.

Trigger.Name: BB Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w-' ]{8}:(?<target>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Bioblaster from (?<player>[\w-' ]+) for (?<time>[\d+.]+) Seconds

Trigger.Name: COM Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.+gains the effect of (?<dot>Combust|Combust II|Combust III) from (?<player>[A-Za-z'\-]+ [A-Za-z'\-]+) for (?<duration>\d+.\d+?) Seconds

Trigger.Name: Ruin IV stack gained
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of .*Further Ruin.

Trigger.Name: Ruin IV Tracker
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of .*Further Ruin.

Trigger.Name: STF Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of .*Standard Finish.

Trigger.Name: TF Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of .*Technical Finish.

Trigger.Name: README -> Description
Trigger.Description:
Thanks for checking out my repository.
Currently there's Visual Dot Timers and Visual Buff Tracker, still want to get more in :)
Most of the DoT regex's are taken from Aho's TTS callouts for them. Thanks Aho! MNK Demolish Regex taken from dansa (from Smol Cute Monk Suite). Thanks dansa!
By default the DoT Tracker sits at 650, 690 and the Buff Tracker at 650, 780. You can change these locations by following these steps (thanks Aho for some of your text!):
1 - Make a folder in your Local Triggers, name it whatever you want. 2 - Copy&Paste the "SETTINGS -> Copy to your Startup Folder" trigger in that new folder 3 - Select said folder as a Startup Folder under : Options -> Edit Configuration -> General -> Startup Folder 4 - Restart ACT or disable/enable the Triggernometry Plugin
In the case you want any DoT Timer or Buff Timer to have a different location from the general settings you can go in the triggers and replace "if(${var:ZeffSettingsLoaded},${var:DoTTrackerX},650)" with just the X or Y location for example: 400
I'll make more as I get information from players.
If you need help or want to send a suggestion my way you can contact me on Discord @Zeffuro#3033

Trigger.Name: SETTINGS -> Copy to your Startup Folder
